name: R4B-AllergyIntolerance-R5-AllergyIntolerance
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B AllergyIntolerance into FHIR R5

element.display: Allergy or Intolerance (generally: Risk of adverse reaction to a substance)

target.display: Allergy or Intolerance (generally: Risk of adverse reaction to a substance)
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance`

element.display: Source of the information about the allergy
food | medication | environment | biologic

target.display: food | medication | environment | biologic
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-category|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-category|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: active | inactive | resolved

target.display: active | inactive | resolved
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.clinicalStatus` - clinicalStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-clinical|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-clinical|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance

target.display: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.code`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.contained`

element.display: low | high | unable-to-assess

target.display: low | high | unable-to-assess
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.criticality` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.criticality` - criticality has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-criticality|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Encounter when the allergy or intolerance was asserted

target.display: Encounter when the allergy or intolerance was asserted
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.encounter`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.id`

element.display: External ids for this item

target.display: External ids for this item
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction

target.display: Date(/time) of last known occurrence of a reaction
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.lastOccurrence` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.lastOccurrence`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Additional text not captured in other fields

target.display: Additional text not captured in other fields
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: When allergy or intolerance was identified

target.display: When allergy or intolerance was identified
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.onset[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.onset[x]`

element.display: Who the sensitivity is for

target.display: Who the allergy or intolerance is for
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.patient` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.patient`

element.display: Adverse Reaction Events linked to exposure to substance

target.display: Adverse Reaction Events linked to exposure to substance
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction`

element.display: Description of the event as a whole

target.display: Description of the event as a whole
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.description`

element.display: How the subject was exposed to the substance

target.display: How the subject was exposed to the substance
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.exposureRoute` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.exposureRoute`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.id`

element.display: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

target.display: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.manifestation` - manifestation has change due to type change: R4B manifestation CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 manifestation

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text about event not captured in other fields

target.display: Text about event not captured in other fields
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: Date(/time) when manifestations showed

target.display: Date(/time) when manifestations showed
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.onset` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.onset`

element.display: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

target.display: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Specific substance or pharmaceutical product considered to be responsible for event

target.display: Specific substance or pharmaceutical product considered to be responsible for event
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.substance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.substance`

element.display: Date first version of the resource instance was recorded

target.display: Date allergy or intolerance was first recorded
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.recordedDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.recordedDate`

element.display: Who recorded the sensitivity
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.text`

element.display: allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)

target.display: allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.type` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.type` - type changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; type has change due to type change: R4B type code has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 type

element.display: unconfirmed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error

target.display: unconfirmed | presumed | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error
target.comment: R4B `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` - verificationStatus has compatible required binding for non-code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
